title: Crime Alert 04.16.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.16.19
description:
Colorado teen pleads guilty to beating a 10-year-old girl to death with a metal pipe. Mom charged with felony child neglect after child almost drowns while she is drunk and high. Hawaii police reopen the 30-year-old cold case of 19-year-old Donny Gouveia –beaten and killed in 1991.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
